description: This entity enables you to manipulate 'KnowledgeBaseSolutions'. It represents the knowledge base solutions in the Service module.

operations.description: Retrieve all or some selected properties from an instance of 'KnowledgeBaseSolutions' with the given id.
Retrieve a collection of 'KnowledgeBaseSolutions' with all or some selected properties in the given order by specifying the given filter condition.
Create an instance of 'KnowledgeBaseSolutions' with the given payload of type 'KnowledgeBaseSolution' in JSON format.
operations.example:
POST https://localhost:50000/b1s/v2/KnowledgeBaseSolutions
{
    "Description": "Application Crashed on Linux system",
    "ItemCode": "item01",
    "Solution": "Crash issue",
    "Symptom": "Application Crashed"
}

operations.description: Update an instance of 'KnowledgeBaseSolutions' with the given payload of type 'KnowledgeBaseSolution' in JSON format and with the specified id.
Delete an instance of 'KnowledgeBaseSolutions' with the specified id.
